title: O.J. And Oscar Trials: A 'Combination Of Celebrity, Wealth And Murder'
teaser: O.J. Simpson's Ford Bronco was chased by police 20 years ago, marking the start of what was dubbed the "trial of the century." But how does its coverage compare with the Oscar Pistorius trial?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
